name: 3AmNightVlog
description:
Use WASD to move

E to interact

F for flashlight

Left CTRL to crouch

You are a streamer doing a 3am video when it's actually 3AM for once, you decided to explore an abandoned market and a weird old house. People have been hearing shouting from this area, so it's sure to be an exciting adventure that should bring in plenty of subs !

Remember to like comment and soobscsribe ! :)

Made it solo in a day and a half for the shitty horror video game jam. Developed with UE5 and uses lumen, so performance might be pretty bad. Got it to run on intel graphics at like 4 fps so it should work on most modern computers.
